ai-mil3.7.15:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, do you know whether or not these things?”
ai-mil3.7.15:1.3_0: “Great king, does consciousness come to be known as marks of consciousness, so having attained the characteristic of investigation of wisdom, is this very life?”
ai-mil3.7.15:1.4_0: “Suppose there was a sight with their eyes. When you hear a sound with your ears, they see a sight with your eyes. When you hear a sound, smell an odor with the nose, tastes, touches, and thoughts.”
ai-mil3.7.15:1.6_0: “Someone with eyesight sees a sight with their eyes. ...
ai-mil3.7.15:1.6_1: When they know a thought with their mind, they’d see visions. They’d hear the sound of the ears, nose or smells, tongue and taste it. They’d see eventually touch the tongue, taste it with their tongue cut through the body, or touches known by the eye.”
ai-mil3.7.15:1.8_0: “Well then, great king, do you gain soul.”
ai-mil3.7.15:3.1_0: in the consciousness, the enquiry, (called) fifteenth,
